definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花崗岩粉碎，採煤，硅酸鹽礦石內植入礦物。

sentences.english: On other occasions I threatened to pulverize it.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的時刻，我揚言要粉碎它。

sentences.english: And I remember standing there that day thinking about the disturbers of mine.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得那天站在那邊思慮着“粉碎我的協調的人”。

sentences.english: Granulate and Shatter can fight, but not well enough.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用化爲碎礫和粉碎抗擊，但它們並不夠好。

sentences.english: The gap between crushing blade and sieve can be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎刀與篩網間隙可調。

sentences.english: He dashed the bowl to bits on a rock.
sentences.chinese: 他把碗跌在岩石上摔得粉碎。

sentences.english: They got knocked out in the semi's, battered actually, end of.
sentences.chinese: 他們在半決賽中被淘汰了，而且被碾得粉碎。

sentences.english: Shattered Type Create the illusion that text is being shattered like glass.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎型創建該文本正在像玻璃破碎的幻想。

sentences.english: The CLF type marine self-suction vertical crushing pump is driven by marine motor.
sentences.chinese: CLF型船用立式自吸粉碎泵由船用電機驅動。

sentences.english: These materials will be re-crushed after rebounding into the scale board.
sentences.chinese: 這些材料將被重新成規模後板反彈粉碎。

sentences.english: The effect of super micro-milling on physical chemistry and functional properties of tartary buckwheat bran was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超微粉碎處理對苦蕎麩理化和功能特性的影響。

sentences.english: Rotor is an important assembly of hammer mill.
sentences.chinese: 轉子是錘片式粉碎機的主要工作部件。

sentences.english: Laibin city police in Guangxi broke up a gambling ring running a racket called "mark-six lottery".
sentences.chinese: 來賓市警方粉碎了一個六合彩賭博集團。

sentences.english: The third was the war to crush the Hamas missile launchers in Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 第三場戰爭是在加沙地區粉碎哈馬斯的導彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Don't give me a colorful dream, then personally into smithereens.
sentences.chinese: 不要給我一個絢麗多姿的夢，再親手打的粉碎。

sentences.english: My glasses slipped from my hand and smashed on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼鏡從手中滑下去，在地板上摔得粉碎。

definition: to shatter/to smash/to break into pieces
all split up and in pieces (idiom); disunity (in an organization)/complete lack of unity/to disintegrate/falling apart/to be at sixes and sevens
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
same as 稀爛|稀烂[xi1 lan4]
